detail.text: Title & Breadcrumb: - Page title: Projects - Breadcrumb: Dashboard → Projects - Uses Page component from Admiral
Layout: - Full width DataTable - Clean, modern interface - Responsive design
Search Functionality: - Auto-suggest search box - Searches by Project Code and Business Initiative Name - Shows suggestions with context (company info) - Real-time filtering as user types
Status Filter: - Single select dropdown - Options: Active, Pending, Completed, Cancelled - Width: 140px
Project Code: - Hyperlink to detail page - Underlined style - Sortable column - Links to /strategic-capital-project/{id}
Project Name: - Full business initiative name - Sortable column - Width: 300px - Text ellipsis for long names
Company: - Company name - Sortable column
Status Indicator: - Tag component with color coding - On Track: green - At Risk: orange - Off Track: red - Sortable column
Workflow Status: - Tag component with color coding - Active: green - Pending: orange - Completed: blue - Cancelled: red - Sortable column
Days Remaining till COD: - Tag component with color coding - >90 days: green - 30-90 days: orange - <30 days: red - Shows '-' if null/undefined - Sortable column
Data Source: - Uses allProjects from _data/index.js - Shares same data with PIMS module - Pagination support through meta data
Loading State: - Shows loading spinner while fetching - Graceful error handling

Document Management Tab: - Document upload/download - File management interface

Project Profile: - Basic project information - Stakeholder details

Project Performance: - Performance tracking - KPI monitoring

Approval Actions: - Approve button (green) - Reject button (red) - Modal confirmation - Optional notes field
